name: Rock Paper Scissors with Baby Doge!
name_original: Rock Paper Scissors with Baby Doge!
description:
Play rock paper scissors with Baby Doge as he makes his way to the Moon!  But watch out for Paper Bear and his evil plans.  (dun dun dun!....)

This is the first game I have ever uploaded, and so there's probably a bug or two I didn't catch.  Feel free to direct message me on Twitter if you find a bug, have any questions, or if you just wanna say hi haha.  I am @LemonRRH.
